# Public Finance & Regulation â€“ Restricted Operations

## Restricted Activities
The following activities are restricted unless explicitly authorized:

- Emergency fiscal reallocations
- Off-cycle public reporting
- Exceptional budget overrides
- Extraordinary financial commitments

## Control Rules
- Restricted operations require explicit approval.
- Approval rationale must be documented.
- Execution must be fully traceable.

## Prohibited
- Implicit authorization
- Verbal or undocumented approval
- Post-facto justification without evidence
